title: Solar Views
description:
“ It's about us not seeing whether something is real or fake

- because we don’t take the time to really look at it,

it’s about how our happiness depends on the weather,

it’s about trying to make a perfect picture of a sunset but

always failing.”

- Sunny

This project is about the fictional Artist „Sunny“ .

Sunny creates only images with the sun. His images are so strong that you

need to wear UV protection to be able to look at his art.

Occasionally he also takes on commissions - for instance to create solar

visuals for the weather forecast channel SunTV.

The following images document the opening of his latest show:

The Sunny Side Up.

Warning:

To avoid longterm damage of your eyes, its strongly recommended to put on

sunglasses BEFORE you enter his exhibition.

The artist takes no responsibility for any health damage caused by his art.

Looking at his art is at your own risk.
